name: Galvantula
author: mashu
flavor_text: It launches electrified fur from its abdomen as its means of attack. Opponents hit by the fur could be in for three full days and nights of paralysis.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.effect: Attacks used by this Pokémon do 50 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon that has an Ability (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Shocking Web
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has any {L} Energy attached, this attack does 80 more damage.
